purpose: Enhance security and operational efficiency for developers and cloud practitioners through a smart terminal interface
principle: Leverages TypeScript for building a secure, rollbackable terminal interface with SSH and PAM integration for enhanced security
reusability: Offers extensibility through plugins and API integrations, allowing customization for specific security and operational needs
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for non-standard environments and lacks comprehensive documentation
name: Chaterm
description: Smart, agentic, security AI terminal for developers and cloud practitioners
highlight: Agentic security AI terminal designed for secure and efficient cloud and development operations
